```{r load data}
data_train = read_csv("../../../data/rossmann/train.csv/train.csv", 
    col_types = cols(Date = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d"),
                     StateHoliday = col_character())
    )

data_stores = read_csv("../../../data/rossmann/store.csv/store.csv")

data_joined = left_join(data_train, data_stores, by = "Store") %>%
  mutate_at(.vars = c("Store", "DayOfWeek", "Open", "Promo", "StateHoliday",
                      "SchoolHoliday", "StoreType", "Promo2"),
            .funs = as.factor)
```
